opponent.label: Bowsette
opponent.writer: The SPNatI Community, deepdiredescent, MÃ¡ximo Cozzetti
opponent.description:
Transformed by the magic of the Super Crown, Bowsette is the King-turned-Queen of the Koopa Kingdom. Due to the nature of the power-up, she bears an uncanny resemblance to Princess Peach.
As a crowdsourced character, all of Bowsette's lines were donated by users like you!
